column5: Luxurious newly renovated 2282 sqft 3 bedroom/3.5 bathroom 3-story townhouse with 6 beds, 2 car garage, granite countertop bathrooms/custom tile, hardwoods throughout, private garage, WIFI, cable TV, flat panel TVs in Montrose/River Oaks area. Walk to grocery store/Starbucks/many restaurants--on Westheimer Street.
